issue.title: [Testing] Add git submodule for arrow-testing data files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4459](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4459). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We now have some test data files in arrow-testing that can be shared across Arrow implementations. We need to add this repo as a submodule in the main Arrow repo.
